dc_title_s: Oil and Gas Fields in the United States, Summer 2014
dc_description_s: This point dataset shows shows information pertaining to oil and gas fields in the United States. This layer is from the summer quarter update of 2014.This dataset is intended to assist users in locating and analyzing United States oil and gas field data and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.
